S0142.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRAD?  1. MAJOR 2. CAPTAIN 3. 1ST LIEUTENANT 4. 2ND LIEUTENANT 5. FLIGHT OFFICER 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q4. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH HAVING AN ASSIGNMENT AS A FIGHTER PILOT, AS COMPARED WITH OTHER TYPES OF COMBAT FLYING ASSIGNMENT?  1. BETTER SATISFIED THAN I WOULD BE WITH ANY OTHER COMBAT FLYING ASSIGNMENT 2. AS WELL SATISFIED AS I WOULD BE WITH ANY OTHER 3. WOULD BE BETTER SATISFIED IN SOME OTHER TYPE OF COMBAT FLYING ASSIGNMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q6. IF YOU WERE DOING IT OVER AGAIN, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD CHOOSE TO SIGN UP FOR COMBAT FLYIN?  1. YES, I'M PRETTY SURE I WOULD 2. YES, I THINK I WOULD, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD 4. NO, I'M SURE I WOULD NOT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0142.Q7. WHEN YOU WERE STARTING YOUR BASIC FLYING TRAINING, DID YOU WANT TO BE ASSIGNED TO FIGHTERS OR TO SOME OTHER TYPE OF AIRCRAF?  1. AT THAT TIME WANTED TO BE ASSIGNED TO FIGHTERS 2. DIDN'T CARE MUCH ONE WAY OR THE OTHER 3. WANTED SOME OTHER ASSIGNMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q8A. AS YOU SEE IT AT PRESENT, WOULD YOU WILLINGLY TAKE ON ANOTHER SERIES OF MISSIONS IN THE EUROPEAN THEATER OF OPERATIONS AFTER SPENDING A 30-DAY FURLOUGH IN THE US?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0142.Q8B. AS YOU SEE IT AT PRESENT, WOULD YOU WILLINGLY TAKE ON ANOTHER SERIES OF MISSIONS IN SOME OTHER THEATER AFTER SPENDING A 30-DAY FURLOUGH IN THE US?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q9. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR TYPE OF OUTFIT WILL PLAY IN WINNING THE WA?  1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART 2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART 3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q10A. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE SEEN, HOW WELL DO YOU FEEL THAT HIGHER HEADQUARTERS (WING, COMMAND, AIR FORCE HQ.) UNDERSTAND YOUR PROBLEMS AND NEED?  1. I FEEL THAT THEY ARE VERY MUCH AWARE OF OUR NEEDS 2. I FEEL THAT THEY ARE FAIRLY WELL AWARE OF OUR NEEDS 3. I FEEL THAT THEY DON'T KNOW VERY MUCH ABOUT OUR REAL PROBLEMS AND NEEDS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 10B AND 10C NOT CODED.

S0142.Q12. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE FOR YOURSELF, WHICH ONE OF THE THREE TYPES OF PLANES WOULD YOU PREFE?  1. P-38 2. P-47 3. P-51 4. P-38 AND P-47 5. P-38 AND P-51 6. P-47 AND P-51 7. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q17. IN YOUR OPINION ARE MOST OF THE COMBAT MISSIONS AT THE PRESENT TIME MORE DIFFICULT, ABOUT THE SAME, OR LESS DIFFICULT THAN THEY WERE AT ABOUT THE TIME WHEN YOU STARTED COMBAT FLYING IN EUROPEAN THEATER OPERATION?  1. ON THE WHOLE THEY ARE LESS DIFFICULT NOW THAN THEY WERE 2. THEY ARE ABOUT THE SAME AS THEY WERE 3. ON THE WHOLE THEY ARE MORE DIFFICULT NOW THAN THEY WERE 4. HAVEN'T BEEN FLYING LONG ENOUGH TO SAY 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0142.Q18. GENERALLY SPEAKING, WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING KINDS OF MISSIONS DO YOU PREFER TO GO O?  1. ESCORT MISSIONS 2. LOW-LEVEL BOMBING AND STRAFING 3. PATROLLING MISSIONS 4. SOME OTHER TYPE OF MISSION 5. 1 AND 2 CHECKED 6. 1 AND 3 CHECKED 7. 1 AND 4 CHECKED 8. 2 AND 3 CHECKED 9. 2 AND 4 CHECKED 0. NO ANSWER
S0142.Q19. HAVE YOU EVER HAD THE FEELING THAT A PARTICULAR MISSION WASN'T WORTH THE COS?  1. YES, QUITE OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q20. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIM?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q21. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0142.Q22. CONSIDERING EVERYTHING, HOW WOULD YOU RATE THE TRAINING YOU RECEIVED IN THE UNITED STATE?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q25A. BEFORE GOING ON YOUR FIRST COMBAT MISSION, ABOUT HOW MANY HOURS HIGH ALTITUDE FLYING ON OXYGEN HAD YOU HAD IN AL?  01. LESS THAN 10 HOURS 02. 10-19 03. 20-29 04. 30-39 05. 40-49 06. 50-59 07. 60-69 08. 70-79 09. 80 OR MORE HOURS 10. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0142.Q25B. BEFORE YOUR FIRST COMBAT MISSION, ABOUT HOW MANY HOURS HAD YOU FLOWN IN THE TYPES OF FORMATION YOU NOW USE IN COMBAT MISSION?  1. 1-24 HOURS 2. 25-49 3. 50-3. 4. 75-99 5. 100-124 6. 125-149 7. 150-174 8. 175 OR MORE HOURS 9. NONE 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q26A. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE GERMANS AFTER THE WA?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY GERMANS 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE GERMAN NATION 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q26B. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE JAPANESE AFTER THE WA?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY JAPANESE 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY JAPANESE PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE JAPANESE NATION 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q27A. DO YOU HAVE ANY PARTICULAR FEELING ABOUT THE WAY THE NEWS OF AMERICAN AIR FORCES (AAF) FIGHTER OPERATIONS IS WRITTEN UP IN BRITISH NEWSPAPER?  1. YES, IT MATTERS QUITE A BIT TO ME WHAT THEY SAY 2. NO, IT DOESN'T MAKE ANY PARTICULAR DIFFERENCE TO ME WHAT THEY SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q27B. ALL THINGS CONSIDERED, DO YOU FEEL THAT THE BRITISH NEWSPAPERS GIVE THE AMERICAN AIR FORCES TOO MUCH CREDIT, TOO LITTLE CREDIT, OR ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF CREDIT FOR THE JOB THEY ARE DOIN?  1. TOO MUCH CREDIT 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF CREDIT 3. TOO LITTLE CREDIT 4. I DON'T READ THEM OFTEN ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q28. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE JOB "STARS AND STRIPES" IS DOING IN REPORTING THE OPERATIONS OF THE EIGHTH AIR FORC?  1. A VERY GOOD JOB 2. A GOOD JOB 3. A FAIR JOB 4. A POOR JOB 5. A VERY POOR JOB 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q29A. DURING THE PAST FOUR WEEKS, HOW MANY FURLOUGHS, LEAVES AND PASSES (FOR 24 HOURS OR MORE) HAVE YOU HA? E. LEAVES OR PASSES:  14 1. ONE 1 2. TWO 0 3. THREE 0 4. FOUR 0 5. FIVE OR MORE 631 6. NONE 8 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q29B. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE PRESENT PRACTICE IN YOUR OUTFIT WITH RESPECT TO THE GRANTING OF LEAVES AND PASSE?  1. IT IS AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. IT COULD BE SOMEWHAT BETTER 3. IT COULD BE A LOT BETTER 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q30. DO YOU USUALLY KNOW AHEAD OF TIME WHEN YOU CAN COUNT ON HAVING A LEAVE OR PAS?  1. USUALLY KNOW A WEEK OR MORE BEFOREHAND 2. USUALLY GIVEN A FEW DAYS NOTICE 3. USUALLY FIND OUT ABOUT IT JUST BEFORE A LEAVE OR PASS IS GRANTED 4. I'M NOT SURE HOW IT WORKS 0. NO ANSWER
S0142.Q31. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE PROMOTION POLICY FOR FIGHTER PILOT?  1. VERY WELL SATISIFED 2. SATISFIED 3. NOT VERY WELL SATISFIED 4. NOT SATISFIED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q32. ON THE AVERAGE, ABOUT HOW MANY HOURS SLEEP PER 24 HOURS DAY HAVE YOU HAD DURING THE LAST 10 DAY?  1. LESS THAN 4 HOURS 2. 4 HOURS 3. 5 HOURS 4. 6 HOURS 5. 7 HOURS 6. 8 HOURS 7. MORE THAN 8 HOURS 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q33. IN GENERAL, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF TIME YOU HAVE FOR SLEE?  1. IT WOULD HELP A LITTLE IF I HAD MORE TIME FOR SLEEP 2. IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF I HAD MORE TIME FOR SLEEP 3. USUALLY HAVE ENOUGH TIME FOR SLEEP 0. NO ANSWER
S0142.Q34. DO YOU EVER HAVE ANY DIFFICULTY IN SLEEPING WHEN YOU HAVE THE CHANC?  1. ALMOST NEVER 2. OCCASIONALLY 3. FAIRLY OFTEN 4. VERY OFTEN 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q35A. THE MEDICAL SERVICE YOU ARE GETTIN?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. COULD BE IMPROVED BUT IT WOULDN'T MAKE TOO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. COULD BE IMPROVED AND IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF IT WERE 4. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q35B. THE FOOD AT YOUR BAS?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. COULD BE IMPROVED BUT IT WOULDN'T MAKE TOO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. COULD BE IMPROVED AND IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF IT WERE 4. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q35C. ARRANGEMENTS FOR GETTING BREAKFAST BEFORE AN EARLY MISSIO?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. COULD BE IMPROVED BUT IT WOULDN'T MAKE TOO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. COULD BE IMPROVED AND IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF IT WERE 4. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q36. ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU LISTEN TO THE AMERICAN FORCES NETWORK, THE RADIO PROGRAMS PUT ON BY THE U.S. ARMY FOR THE AMERICAN FORCES OVERSEA?  1. ALMOST EVERY DAY 2. THREE OR FOUR TIMES A WEEK 3. ONCE OR TWICE A WEEK 4. LESS THAN ONCE A WEEK 5. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

ALL THINGS CONSIDERED, DO YOU FEEL THAT THE BRITISH RADIO PROGRAMS GIVE THE AMERICAN AIR FORCES TOO MUCH CREDIT, TOO LITTLE CREDIT, OR ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF CREDIT FOR THE JOB THEY ARE DOIN?  1. TOO MUCH CREDIT 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF CREDIT 3. TOO LITTLE CREDIT 4. I DON'T LISTEN TO THEM OFTEN ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER
S0142.Q38A. ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU LISTEN TO THE GERMAN RADIO PROGRAM?  1. ALMOST EVERY DAY 2. THREE OR FOUR TIMES A WEEK 3. ONCE OR TWICE A WEEK 4. LESS THAN ONCE A WEEK 5. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q38B. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE NEWS AND TALKS INCLUDED IN GERMAN RADIO PROGRAM?  1. VERY LITTLE TRUTH IN WHAT THEY SAY 2. SOME TRUTH IN WHAT THEY SAY 3. A GOOD DEAL OF TRUTH IN WHAT THEY SAY 4. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q39A. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE BEEN GIVEN AS MUCH INFORMATION AS YOU WOULD LIKE TO HAVE ABOUT THE KIND OF ASSIGNMENTS MEN CAN GET AT THAT TIM?  1. YES, I FEEL I HAVE BEEN GIVEN ENOUGH INFORMATION ABOUT THIS 2. NO, I WISH I HAD MORE INFORMATION ABOUT THIS 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q39B. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE PRESENT POLICY REGARDING ASSIGNMENT OF MEN AT THAT TIM?  1. I THINK THE POLICY IS ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT CAN BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. I THINK THE POLICY OUGHT TO BE IMPROVED 3. I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE POLICY OF ASSIGNMENT IS 0. NO ANSWER

S0142.Q39C. CONSIDERING WHAT YOU PERSONALLY CAN CONTRIBUTE TO THE WAR EFFORT, WHAT KIND OF AN ARMY ASSIGNMENT DO YOU THINK YOU OUGHT TO HAVE AT THAT TIM?  01. INSTRUCTOR IN THE U.S.; TRAINING SCHOOL, ETC. 02. INSTRUCTOR - LOCALE UNSPECIFIED OR LOCALE OTHER THAN U.S. SPECIFIED 03. ANOTHER COMBAT TOUR, AFTER A REST; "COMBAT" (EUROPEAN THEATER OPERATIONS OR THEATER UNSPECIFIED) 04. ANOTHER COMBAT TOUR IN SOME OTHER THEATER 05. ATC OR FERRY COMMAND JOB 06. OTHER NON-COMBATANT FLYING JOB (TEST PILOT, PHOTOGRAPHIC UNIT, ETC.) 07. OTHER JOB IN U.S. 08. GROUND JOB, IN EUROPEAN THEATER OPERATIONS (OR SPECIFIED DESIRE TO STAY WITH PRESENT OUTFIT) 09. GROUND JOB, LOCALE NOT SPECIFIED 10. MISCELLANEOUS AND UNCLASSIFIABLE 11. DON'T KNOW, UNDECIDED 00. NO ANSWER
